vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.8.7
§ Pelaiah = "Jehovah does wonders"
1) son of Elioenai and a descendant of David in the royal line
2) a priest who helped Ezra to expound the law to the people and also sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
毗萊雅 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華成就奇事"
1) 以利約乃的兒子, 大衛王王室家族的一位後裔 (代上 3:24)
2) 一位協助以斯拉向民眾宣導律法書教訓的祭司, 他也是在和尼希米所訂的公約上簽名者之一 (尼 8:7;10:10)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
毗莱雅 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华成就奇事"
1) 以利约乃的儿子, 大卫王王室家族的一位后裔 (代上 3:24)
2) 一位协助以斯拉向民众宣导律法书教训的祭司, 他也是在和尼希米所订的公约上签名者之一 (尼 8:7;10:10)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.3.24;
son of: Elioenai (H0454B);
brother of: Hodaviah (H1938), Eliashib (H0475), Akkub (H6126), Johanan (H3110I), Delaiah (H1806) and Anani (H6054)
§ Pelaiah = "Jehovah does wonders"
1) son of Elioenai and a descendant of David in the royal line
2) a priest who helped Ezra to expound the law to the people and also sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Zorobabel; tribu de Judá
